'''Starsilver''' is a [[Forging Material]] item. They are used when [[Forging]] for [[Fine Enhancement Ore]] and a variety of [[weapons]].

==How to Obtain==
Starsilver can be mined only in [[Dragonspine]]. See the gallery or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=139 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

They can be harvested by attacking their destructible nodes, dropping 1-3 Starsilver each. Like all [[Geo Constructs]], it is faster to destroy them using [[Blunt Attack]]s and {{Geo}} abilities. Their respawn rate is 48 hours.

In [[Co-Op Mode]], each nearby player will get their own drops with amounts randomized separately and players will not be able to see others' drops. Unlike most [[Materials]], they cannot be affected by {{Anemo}} abilities that may move them.
